com.taobao.datax.engine.storage
类 Storage

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.datax.engine.storage.Storage
直接已知子类：
FileStorage, NULLStorage, RAMStorage, RouteStorage
public abstract class Storage
extends java.lang.Object

A buffer where Reader and Writer exchange data.

构造方法详细信息

Storage

public Storage()
方法详细信息

init

public boolean init(java.lang.String id,
                    int lineLimit,
                    int byteLimit,
                    int destructLimit)
Initialization for Storage.

参数：
id - Writer id.
lineLimit - Limit of the line number the Storage can hold.
byteLimit - Limit of the bytes the Storage can hold.
返回：
true for OK, false for failed.

info

public abstract java.lang.String info()
Get information about Storage.

返回：
Storage information.

push

public abstract boolean push(Line line)
Push one line into Storage, used by Reader

参数：
line - One line of record, see Line
返回：
true for OK, false for failure.

push

public abstract boolean push(Line[] lines,
                             int size)
Push multiple lines into Storage, used by Reader

参数：
lines - multiple lines of records, see Line
size - limit of line number to be pushed.
返回：
true for OK, false for failure.

fakePush

public abstract boolean fakePush(int lineLength)
For test.

pull

public abstract Line pull()
Pull one line from Storage, used by Writer.

返回：
one Line of record.

pull

public abstract int pull(Line[] lines)
Pull multiple lines from Storage, used by Writer.

参数：
lines - an empty array which will be filled with multiple Line as the result.
返回：
number of lines pulled。

isPushClosed

public boolean isPushClosed()
Check if Storage is closed for pushing data.

返回：
true for closed, false for not closed.

setPushClosed

public void setPushClosed(boolean close)
Set push status.

参数：
close - true for closing push, false for opening push.

size

public abstract int size()
Get size of Storage in bytes

返回：
Storage size.

empty

public abstract boolean empty()
Check Storage is empty.

返回：
true if empty.

getLineLimit

public abstract int getLineLimit()

getStat

public Storage.Statistics getStat()
